Name: The Yellow Quiz
About the game: The Yellow Quiz - a fun multiplayer game for parties that turns your smartphone into a wireless game controller. It's simple: You'll only need your smartphones and a TV or any other big Screen. The Yellow Quiz comes with three simple and fun game modes: Classical Quiz: Square off in a classic Multiple Choice Quiz against your friends. Guess Roulette: Pick a number that best answers the question and place a bet on it. The correct number isn't always picked but the closer you get the better are your chances. Drawing : Draw something on a prompt and let your friends guess what you meant. The Yellow Quiz requires each player to have the free Controller App (see Website or Manual ) in order to be played.
